name: php-add-property
description: Quick way to manage PHP class properties

phpAddProperty.property.visibility.choos.description: Specifies whether to choose property visibility when inserting

phpAddProperty.property.stopToImport.description: Specifies whether to stop after typing the type to refer to an external fully qualified name with an alias or importing

phpAddProperty.property.docblock.add.description: Specifies whether to add a docblock @var type to the property

phpAddProperty.property.docblock.multili.description: Specifies whether to use a multiline docblock

phpAddProperty.property.docblock.withPar.description: Specifies whether to add the docblock @var type to the property and the constructor parameter type at the same time

phpAddProperty.property.docblock.stopToI.description: Specifies whether to stop after typing the @var type to refer to an external fully qualified name with an alias or importing

phpAddProperty.property.types.markdownDescription: Specifies whether to enable PHP 7.4+ typed properties [More info](https://wiki.php.net/rfc/typed_properties_v2)

phpAddProperty.constructor.docblock.enab.description: Specifies whether to add/update the docblock to the constructor

phpAddProperty.constructor.docblock.with.description: Specifies whether to add the docblock @param type together with the constructor parameter type

phpAddProperty.constructor.docblock.stop.description: Specifies whether to stop after typing the @param type to refer to an external fully qualified name with an alias or importing
Specifies whether to stop after typing the @var type to add a description

phpAddProperty.constructor.visibility.ch.description: Specifies whether to choose constructor visibility when inserting

phpAddProperty.constructor.breakIntoMult.description: Specifies whether to break the constructor into multiple lines if the given line length is exceeded
Specifies the maximum line length before using a multiline constructor

phpAddProperty.showMessagesOnStatusBar.description: Specifies whether to show messages on status bar instead of notification box

phpAddProperty.showContextMenuOptions.description: Specifies whether to show the context menu options

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
